definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Shaving leg hair and armpit hair gel when used to, because it does not make you feel dry.
sentences.chinese: 刮腿毛及腋毛時可用去毛膠，因它不會讓你感到乾澀。

sentences.english: Axillary hair is especially unsightly for women in certain cultures during the summer time.
sentences.chinese: 尤其在夏天，過多的腋毛常造成女性的困擾。

sentences.english: I forgot to shave my armpits.
Also had armpit hair in that times.
sentences.chinese: 那時我已經開始長腋毛了。

sentences.english: It usually affects the armpits, palms, or soles of the feet.
sentences.chinese: 通常在腋毛處，掌心，或者足底處。

sentences.english: University offers female students extra credit for not shaving their armpits.
sentences.chinese: 高校向那些不刮腋毛的女學生獎勵特別學分。

sentences.english: I am a man and a very masculine one and shave my pits.
sentences.chinese: 我是男人，一個非常陽剛的男人，我剃腋毛。

sentences.english: However, I had forgotten to shave my armpits.

definition: to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation/to shave
body odor/bromhidrosis/armpit odor/underarm stink/also called 狐臭[hu2 chou4]
